Name: 30-50 Feral Hogs
About the game: Legit question for rural Americans - How do I kill the 30-50 feral hogs that run into my yard within 3-5 mins while my small kids play? This game will answer that question; defend your grandchildren from the onslaught of feral hogs in this top down shooter. Level up and gradually go insane, culminating in an apocalyptic confrontation with hordes of demonic hogs.
